name: Metroflux
description:
"Beanman is on a journey to reach the center of the mysterious city with this path being a complex gauntlet of puzzles, traps, and foes. The bulk of the challenges consist of game screens, most of which Beanman must navigate and overcome in order to progress. This place is not as it seems, though. While conquering the gauntlet is one thing, discovering the secrets of the city is another.."

Arrow keys to move,   Z to jump,   X to interact,   and Spacebar to enter a console screen via a transmitter or to exit through a door within the game world. Transmitters are flashing devices that are usually located near a console.

Have fun and please tell me what you think. I'm aware of many of the bugs and unfinished sections, but this should give you an idea of what I'm trying to do.
